column1: Meanwhile, some research on the use of polyphenols, derived from Broussonetia papyrifera, or Paper Mulberry, seems to show some effectiveness in dealing with those spike proteins. NCBI "Evaluation of polyphenols from Broussonetia papyrifera as coronavirus protease inhibitors"
